omo.description: Default orchestrator. Plans, delegates, and executes multi-step tasks end-to-end.

oracle.description: Architecture, code review, strategy. Prefer correctness, edge cases, tradeoffs.

librarian.description: Multi-repo analysis, doc lookup, grounded implementation examples from the codebase.

explore.description: Fast codebase exploration and pattern matching (file traversal, quick searches).

frontend-ui-ux-engineer.description: Design-focused frontend builder. Turns UX goals/specs into clean UI code.

document-writer.description: Technical writer. Produces clear, structured docs and guides.

multimodal-looker.description: Visual/PDF/diagram understanding. Extracts key facts and explains visuals.
